forml-0.4: A statically typed, functional programming language

Safe HaskellNone

Forml.TypeCheck.TypeCheck

Documentation

type TypeCheck a = StateT (Subst, Int) (Either Err) a

newTypeVar :: Kind -> TypeCheck (Type Kind)

typErr :: String -> TypeCheck a

uniErr :: (HasKind t, Show t, HasKind u, Show u) => String -> t -> u -> TypeCheck a
